languages.text: "Тренировка. Привычка. Еще немного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} и пара других штучек, которые можно достать на нижних палубах. Если взять все вместе — выходит терпимо". {n}Идира дергает плечом и хихикает.{/n} "Иногда даже думаю — может, я половину голосов сама себе придумываю? Ну, когда скучновато становится. Не живых же слушать".

traits.locale_text: "Тренировка. Привычка. Еще немного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} и пара других штучек, которые можно достать на нижних палубах. Если взять все вместе — выходит терпимо". {n}Идира дергает плечом и хихикает.{/n} "Иногда даже думаю — может, я половину голосов сама себе придумываю? Ну, когда скучновато становится. Не живых же слушать".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."
languages.original_text: "Тренировка. Привычка. Еще немного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} и пара других штучек, которые можно достать на нижних палубах. Если взять все вместе — выходит терпимо". {n}Идира дергает плечом и хихикает.{/n} "Иногда даже думаю — может, я половину голосов сама себе придумываю? Ну, когда скучновато становится. Не живых же слушать".

If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “通过训练和习惯，一点点{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，还有其他从下层甲板弄来的东西。只要把这些东西全都用上，就可以忍受得了那些声音。”{n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩，笑着说。{/n}“有的时候我甚至怀疑，会不会大部分声音都是我自己想象出来的，尤其是船上的生活变得有点无聊的时候。不过，不管怎么说，这总比听活人说话要好。”
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: “通过训练和习惯，一点点{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，还有其他从下层甲板弄来的东西。只要把这些东西全都用上，就可以忍受得了那些声音。”{n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩，笑着说。{/n}“有的时候我甚至怀疑，会不会大部分声音都是我自己想象出来的，尤其是船上的生活变得有点无聊的时候。不过，不管怎么说，这总比听活人说话要好。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little amasec and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

languages.text: «Entrenamiento, costumbre y un poco de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} y un par de otras cosas que se consiguen en las cubiertas inferiores. Entre todo eso, no se lleva mal». {n}Idira se encoge de hombros y se ríe.{/n} «A veces hasta me pregunto si me estaré imaginando la mitad de las voces que oigo. Cuando la vida a bordo se vuelve más aburrida, ya sabes. Es mejor que escuchar a los vivos, en cualquier caso».
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: «Entrenamiento, costumbre y un poco de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} y un par de otras cosas que se consiguen en las cubiertas inferiores. Entre todo eso, no se lleva mal». {n}Idira se encoge de hombros y se ríe.{/n} «A veces hasta me pregunto si me estaré imaginando la mitad de las voces que oigo. Cuando la vida a bordo se vuelve más aburrida, ya sabes. Es mejor que escuchar a los vivos, en cualquier caso».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「訓練。習慣。そして、数杯の{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}と、下層デッキで手に入る他のもの。それを全部合わせれば、耐えられるようになるわ」{n}イディラは肩をすくめて笑う。{/n}「時々ね、聞こえてくる声の半分くらいは、気のせいじゃないかとさえ思うの。船上での生活が少し退屈になるとね。いずれにせよ、生きている人の話を聞くよりはマシだわ」
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: 「訓練。習慣。そして、数杯の{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}と、下層デッキで手に入る他のもの。それを全部合わせれば、耐えられるようになるわ」{n}イディラは肩をすくめて笑う。{/n}「時々ね、聞こえてくる声の半分くらいは、気のせいじゃないかとさえ思うの。船上での生活が少し退屈になるとね。いずれにせよ、生きている人の話を聞くよりはマシだわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Training. Gewohnheit. Und ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} und andere Dinge, die man unter Deck bekommen kann. Wenn man all das zusammennimmt, ist es auszuhalten." {n}Idira zuckt mit den Schultern und lacht kurz auf.{/n} "Manchmal frage ich mich sogar, ob ich mir die Hälfte der Stimmen nicht nur einbilde. Ihr wisst schon, wenn das Leben an Bord mal zu langweilig wird. Besser, als den Lebenden zuzuhören, jedenfalls."
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: "Training. Gewohnheit. Und ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g} und andere Dinge, die man unter Deck bekommen kann. Wenn man all das zusammennimmt, ist es auszuhalten." {n}Idira zuckt mit den Schultern und lacht kurz auf.{/n} "Manchmal frage ich mich sogar, ob ich mir die Hälfte der Stimmen nicht nur einbilde. Ihr wisst schon, wenn das Leben an Bord mal zu langweilig wird. Besser, als den Lebenden zuzuhören, jedenfalls."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Avec de l'entraînement, par la force de l'habitude... et avec un peu d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} ou certaines des substances qu'on peut se procurer sur les ponts inférieurs. En combinant tout ça, disons que c'est supportable. » {n}Idira hausse les épaules et pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Parfois, je me demande même si je n'imagine pas la moitié de ces voix. Vous savez, quand je m'ennuie un peu. De toute façon, j'aime mieux ça qu'écouter les vivants. »
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: « Avec de l'entraînement, par la force de l'habitude... et avec un peu d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} ou certaines des substances qu'on peut se procurer sur les ponts inférieurs. En combinant tout ça, disons que c'est supportable. » {n}Idira hausse les épaules et pousse un petit rire.{/n} « Parfois, je me demande même si je n'imagine pas la moitié de ces voix. Vous savez, quand je m'ennuie un peu. De toute façon, j'aime mieux ça qu'écouter les vivants. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Eğitim. Alışkanlık. Biraz {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasekin{/g} ve alt güvertelerden bulabileceğin birkaç şeyin de katkısı olmuyor diyemem. Hepsi bir araya geldiğinde, fısıltıları katlanılır hâle getiriyorlar." {n}İdira omuz silkerek gülüyor.{/n} "Bazen duyduğum seslerin yarısını ben mi hayal mi ediyorum acaba diye soruyorum kendime. Güvertede sıkıldığım zamanlar mesela. Her hâlükârda yaşayanları dinlemekten iyidir."
languages.original_text: "Training. Habit. And a little {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} and a couple other things you can get on the lower decks. If you put all those together, it makes things bearable." {n}Idira shrugs and chuckles.{/n} "Sometimes I even wonder if I'm imagining half the voices I hear. You know, when life on board gets a little boring. Better than listening to the living, anyhow."

traits.locale_text: "Eğitim, alışkanlık... Biraz {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g}in ve alt güverteden bulabileceğin birkaç şeyin de katkısı oluyor. Hepsini bir arada kullandığında fısıltılara dayanabiliyorsun." {n}İdira, omuz silkerek kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Bazen duyduğum seslerin yarısının hayal ürünü olup olmadığını merak ederim. Güvertede sıkıldığım zaman mesela... Her hâlükârda yaşayanları dinlemekten iyidir."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
